entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test Plan for "Partial Properties" feature #73090
  • Test CollectionBuilder_MissingInt32 hits an assertion failure when lowering layer does not use int32 #73085
  • Floating-point to integer conversions should saturate on overflow #73084
  • Issue with Strong Name Signing stopping IntelliSense from working #73082

Closed

  • The caracteristic "Missing Importations detection" is not available due to an internal error. #73083
  • Compiler conversion crash with collectoin exprs. #72898
    17.11
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34817.155 #73076

PullRequests

Created

  • Defer loading source-texts on the OOP side until actually needed. (part2) #73094
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change IReferenceFinder.DetermineDocumentsToSearchAsync to not return an ImmutableArray #73093
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Include file name in Contract failures #73092
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add partial properties feature status #73091
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Hook up TS pull diagnostics with TODOs #73089
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Defer loading source-texts on the OOP side until actually needed. #73088
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Exclude assemblies shared by .NET ServiceHub host #73087
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use a simple temp instead of InlineArray1 #73086
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Visit binary operators in ref safety analysis #73081
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Watch razor and cshtml files for devkit #73077
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Allow WatchHotReloadService to change capabilities during session #73066
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move to an iterative approach to determining next sibling in the blender #73054
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Pass along cancellation token in snippets #73071
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue in editor config filepath comparison #73033
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • remove unused event from interface that was never subscribed to #73080
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Have the workspace cache the semantic model (after it is acquired) for the active document (if one exists). #73074
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to an explicit stack to avoid stack overflow when computing tree equivalence #73056
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Document deviation from member lookup standard #72858
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Use 'nullable disabled' semantic model when computing FAR results #73078
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use 'nullable disabled' semantic model when computing doc highlights results #73079
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Nullable analysis of conditional operator should use best common type unless target typed #73047
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Partial properties: merging declarations and emit of simple cases #72999
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • DO NOT MERGE. Implement MEF based pull diagnostics #73073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Followup work to handle ForegroundThreadAffinitizedObject removal. #73049
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement Lookup APIs on extensions #72948
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Fix Double-to-Long overflow check #73016
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.11
  • Allow unsafe blocks in iterators #73046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Specially handle more scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Avoid asserting unvisited nested binary operators #72935
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
